articles.summary: Motley Fool: Is Bitcoin a Buy, Sell, or Hold in 2026?. Bitcoin's four-year cycle appears to be broken. Here's what's actually driving prices now -- and how to play it in 2026. Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, TSLA.
